resources:
Estudio_Numerologico Surnames Let´s Go About Birthday Name PERSONAL INFO Student of the National University of San Agustin Cabala Numerical Event Day´s Tonic Tonic Urgency CABAL OF THE YEAR MEANING / NUMBERS DAY EVENT DAY´S TONIC " FUNDAMENTAL TONIC" INTERNAL URGENCY
//Urgencia This number makes the entrepreneur, original, willing. This number makes the person sociable, with imagination. This number makes the person creative, with art and beauty. This number makes the person firm, solid. This number makes the person reasoned, rigorously, prone to learning. This number makes the person affectionate, undecided. This number makes the person tending to fight. This number makes the person patient. This number makes the person generous, with great ideas, independent.
//Tónica This number indicates that the person has to work with great will, with original ideas, to be an entrepreneur. This number indicates that the person has to learn to associate with others, listen to contrary opinions without getting angry, develop the creative imagination. This number indicates that the person has to work with art and beauty in everything he does, in dressing, in speaking. This number indicates that the person has to lay the firm foundations in their projects and jobs. This number indicates that the person has to see the pros and cons of everything that is proposed. This number indicates that the person has to be decisive and care for what he does. This number indicates that the person has to put a lot of effort into everything he does. This number indicates that the person has to be very patient, know how to wait. This number indicates that the person has to be generous and great, preferably work independently.
//Suceso The one shows that on the day of your birth you were the priority of your loved ones El dos demuestra que el día de tu nacimiento acontecio un suceso que cambio la vida de dos personas The three shows that on the day of your birth there was the existential renewal of 3 people, yours to be born and that of your parents for their conversion The four shows that on the day of your birth a radical change was observed since it is possible that you are the 4th member of your family The five shows that on the day of your birth you did not cry until the 5th slap, you were so sure of your existence that you knew that crying was unnecessary The six shows that the day of your birth was not until 6 minutes after birth that the doctors knew you were healthy, it is a record, most take hours Seven shows that on the day of your birth your mother forgave everyone who had hurt her, knowing that she is now invincible Eight demonstrates that on the day of your birth someone stubborn but strong and brave was born, you moved everyone around you Nine shows that on the day of your birth someone was born, who will understand others at any cost.
//Numérico Sign of creativity, independence, originality, sense of self and self-sufficiency. Individualistic and aggressive nature. Initiators of actions, pioneering spirit, courage, extraordinary will and determination. Sign of empathy, cooperation, adaptability, consideration towards others, super sensitivity to the needs of others. Symbol of balance, union and receptivity. Self-expressive in many aspects and with communicative capacity; It is the sign of artistic expression, sociability, sympathy, superficiality and wasteful spirit. Symbol of communication, interaction and neutrality. Strong sense of order and values. It is the sign of practicality, loyalty, rigidity and repression. It is also a symbol of creation, of the fight against limits, of scientific mindset, attention to detail, capable of achieving important achievements and ingenuity for the organization. Fine administrative skills. Sign of action and restlessness. It is the symbol of freedom, adaptability, the traveling and adventurous spirit, but also of inconsistency and abuse of the senses. Sign of love, responsibility, understanding, but also of nosy and jealous people. It is a number associated with honesty and fidelity. Sign of thought, spirituality, conscience, psychic analysis, wisdom "\ n" The number of intellect, idealism and repression. Sign of power, executive ability, management, material power and a tendency to sacrifice but also to have no scruples. Political skills, expert in managing power and authority, work for causes and to achieve recognition, ability to decide and command. Sign of artistic genius, humanitarian sense, tendency to romance and emotionally sentimental. Animatedly friendly and friendly, selfless, interested in doing their job willingly and well. Art and writting skills.
//Cábala "	" ARCANO 1: THE MAGICIAN "
" THE MAN: «Sword. Will. Power »." 
 "Transcendental Axiom" 
 "Be in your works as you are in your thoughts" 
 " "	" ARCANO 2: THE PRIESTHOOD "
" Transcendental Axiom "
" The wind and waves are always in favor of who knows how to navigate "
" "	" ARCANO 3: THE EMPRESS "
" Transcendental Axiom "
" Weaving is your loom, fabric for your use and fabrics that you don't have to use "
" Looking at the practical aspect of life we find that Number 3 is both the Material and Spiritual production "
" "	" ARCANO 4: THE EMPEROR "
" Transcendental Axiom "
" Command. Progress. Success. Mercy "
" Number 4 is the Tetrada, the planet that corresponds to it is Uranus, and it is clear that the Cancer Constellation is the fourth constellation. When it comes to color, Dark Red and Platinum is the metal "
" "	" ARCANO 5: THE HIERARCH "
" Transcendental Axiom "
" From ears I had heard you, but now my eyes see you and my heart feels you "
" Life has begun to flow from outside to inside , we are faced with the dilemma of Being or not Being, we need to define ourselves or Angels or Demons, or Eagles or Reptiles, face our own destiny "
" "	" ARCANO 6: INDECISION: THE LOVE "
" Transcendental Axiom "
" Works give me Lord, more with them strength "
" In Arcane No. 6 is the struggle between the Two Ternaries the Affirmation of the Inner Christ and the Supreme Denial of Satan "
" "	" ARCANO 7: THE TRIUMPH "
" Transcendent Axiom "
" When science enters your heart and wisdom is sweet to your soul, ask and it will be given to you "
" "	" ARCANO 8: THE JUSTICE "
" The Arcanum No. 8: means Hard Proofs, it is Righteousness, Justice, Balance. You have to look for good at any cost, because the Medical Masters when it comes to a patient who is dying, they try to save him because that is the Law, they comply with doing good "
" "	" ARCANO 9: EL EREMITA "
" ELEMENT DE PREDICCIÓN "
" Promises science to make discoveries, order to make them and caution to use them. Proprietary associations and infautas associations "
" Belongs to Number 9 Emotion, Wisdom, Generosity, Genius "
"
//Tónica Día Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: work with great will, with original ideas, be an entrepreneur. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: learn to associate with others, listen to contrary opinions without getting angry, develop the creative imagination. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: work with art and beauty in everything he does, in dressing, in speaking. What indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: lay the firm foundations in their projects and work. Which indicates that in order to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: see the pro and against everything that is proposed. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: be decisive and care for what he does. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: put a lot of effort into everything he does. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to: be very patient, know how to wait. Which indicates that to be more likely to succeed in what one sets out, the person on this day, would have to be: generous and great, preferably work independently.
